title: Peter Scott on Artificial Intelligence (Audio)
itunes:title: Peter Scott on Artificial Intelligence (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. \u0010(Carol Solo)\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Peter J. Scott\u0010Author / Artist\u0010Discussing his book "Crisis of Control: How Artificial Super Intelligences May Destroy or Save the Human Race."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
